channel.title: 3 Word Story
channel.description:
Basically you just post 3 words to add onto the current story. :)
Be sure to copy the current story into your post, not just the 3 words you're adding onto it.
The story ends...well it never ends I guess. Can't think of a way to determine when it should end.
